I work in a place called the Great

researching a group of people called
Maroons who escaped from slavery in the
17 and 1800's and went to live deep in
this remote area in this really
inhospitable place called the swamp and
I used chemistry and physics to look at
little tiny pieces of glass that the
Maroons left behind on their islands in
their community in order to figure out
how they formed a community what they
